title: Champion of Hermes
name: Dracodoodle - Champion of Hermes
printed_effect: When a Cockatoodle is sent to your Underworld you can Special Cast this Dracodoodle from your Underworld with {wind}{wind}. You may only play 1 Dracodoodle this way each turn. This Dracodoodle gets +2{attack} for each Suppressed card on the field.
effect: When a Cockatoodle is sent to your Underworld you can Special Cast this Dracodoodle from your Underworld with {wind}{wind}. You may only play 1 Dracodoodle this way each turn. This Dracodoodle gets +2 {attack} for each Suppressed card on the field.
